channel.title: Battle-Ages
channel.description:
[center][center][img]http://battle-ages.net/community/images/Seamus/misc/logo.png[/img] [/center]
[u]Development Team [/u][img]http://i.imgur.com/qG7DzAK.gif[/img]Nick
[u]Updates Log [/u][spoiler] -Client music -Netty Networking -Implemented Bank pins -Fixed Godswords stances and attack animations -Deposit all/deposit box/bank interfaces added -Soulsplit healing effects -Rewrote Combat -Rewrote Crafting -Rewrote Firemaking -New client with resizable/maximizable, and fixed mode that are interchangable, -"Buy X" and "Sell X" options for shop interfaces.[/spoiler] [u]Media[/u]
[spoiler][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/i4WisrD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/b3hHD8p.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Q9Jzd6C.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pdi5pEX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SbeupVB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t41Vtve.png[/img][/spoiler][/center]

item.title: Battle-Ages
item.dc:creator: @banxyg banxyg
item.description:
@banxyg wrote:

[quote=“Bellend, post:6, topic:540636”]Name: Kieran Devlin
Age: 17
Gender: Male

Anything else is irrelevant or not needed. Don’t start asking things like “How many years you been coding?” Because thats just a load of shit. Anyone can make up lies.
You’ll find my coding level when you watch me code. It doesn’t take a genius to work it out.[/quote]

I PM’d ya my skype.

Read full topic

item.title: Battle-Ages
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
@Bellend wrote:

Name: Kieran Devlin
Age: 17
Gender: Male

Anything else is irrelevant or not needed. Don’t start asking things like “How many years you been coding?” Because thats just a load of shit. Anyone can make up lies.
You’ll find my coding level when you watch me code. It doesn’t take a genius to work it out.

item.title: Battle-Ages
item.dc:creator: @banxyg banxyg
item.description:
@banxyg wrote:

[quote=“Bellend, post:4, topic:540636”]Is this team open to new developers or is it just a show off to boost their ego?
If you’re opening to new people count me in…[/quote]

Yes, you would have to submit an application though.

Read full topic

item.title: Battle-Ages
item.dc:creator: @banxyg banxyg
item.description:
@banxyg wrote:

[quote=“xEthanx, post:2, topic:540636”]Do you mean client music as in actual in-game music that changes based on your map location or that garbage where you just throw mp3 files into a “music” folder and it just cycles through them?

Good luck I guess.[/quote]

Thank you, it is time consuming adding all the sounds, only the needed sounds will be added.

Read full topic

item.title: Battle-Ages
item.dc:creator: @banxyg banxyg
item.description:
@banxyg wrote:

[center][center]
[/center]

Development Team
Nick

Updates Log
[spoiler]
-Client music
-Netty Networking
-Implemented Bank pins
-Fixed Godswords stances and attack animations
-Deposit all/deposit box/bank interfaces added
-Soulsplit healing effects
-Rewrote Combat
-Rewrote Crafting
-Rewrote Firemaking
-New client with resizable/maximizable, and fixed mode that are interchangable,
-“Buy X” and “Sell X” options for shop interfaces.[/spoiler]
Media

[spoiler]




[/spoiler][/center]
